zxcvbn.Common names and surnames are easy to gu: 常见的名字和姓氏易于猜测
zxcvbn.Names and surnames by themselves are eas: 仅有名字和姓氏的密码易于猜测
zxcvbn.Repeats like \"aaa\" are easy to guess: 类似 aaa 的重复字母很容易被猜到
zxcvbn.Repeats like \"abcabcabc\" are only slig: 类似 abcabcabc 的重复字母很容易被猜到
zxcvbn.Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to g: 类似 abc 或 6543 的序列很容易被猜到
zxcvbn.Short keyboard patterns are easy to gues: 简短的键位组合易于猜测
zxcvbn.Straight rows of keys are easy to guess: 键盘上连续的序列易于猜测
zxcvbn.This is similar to a commonly used passw: 此密码与常见密码类似
